definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: Genentech, United States, is a wholly owned member of the Roche Group.
sentences.chinese: 美國的基因技術公司是羅氏集團的擁有成員。

sentences.english: Roche has made two big deals to advance the RNA technology.
sentences.chinese: 羅氏公司已經完成了兩個關於RNA技術的交易。

sentences.english: This demonstrates the strong academic foundation Roche.
sentences.chinese: 這體現了羅氏深厚的學術功底。

sentences.english: The underground mills of Col-des-Roches are unusual.
sentences.chinese: 羅氏山口的地下磨坊是很不尋常的景觀。

sentences.english: The magnetic core Rogowski Current Coil should reduce inner resistance as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 帶磁芯的羅氏線圈應儘可能減小線圈內阻。

sentences.english: Roche has a majority stake in Chugai Pharmaceutical, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 羅氏同時也在日本的出該藥業擁有絕對股份。

sentences.english: Artificial breeding of Macrobracium roseabergii was conducted in the hatcheries originaly, used for shrimps.
sentences.chinese: 利用對蝦人工繁殖基地進行羅氏沼蝦人工育苗。

sentences.english: Roche argued that Amgen's newer patents were invalid.
sentences.chinese: 羅氏認爲安進這些更新的專利是無效的。

sentences.english: The Swiss pharmaceutical company, Roche , said it would suspend selling the drug to private doctors.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士羅氏藥廠暫停向私家醫生供應。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
